thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: GOP Group Bets on Rare Procedure as Path to House Floor for Immigration Bills

author: Kristina Peterson
title: GOP Group Bets on Rare Procedure as Path to House Floor for Immigration Bills
text:
WASHINGTON—A group of House Republicans took an unusual procedural step Wednesday aimed at forcing a vote on a series of immigration bills, a move made over the objections of House GOP leaders.
The cluster of centrist Republicans said they had filed a discharge petition in an effort to circumvent House leaders and bring immigration legislation to the floor, which would return the issue to the political spotlight ahead of this fall’s midterm elections.
...
